title: Zone
description: Zone represents a particular part of the map such as the track itself, the pitlane or the finish line. Zones are hierarchically organised and described in terms of GeoJSON feature collections

slug.description: User-friendly and URL-valid name of the zone. [Learn more about the slug concept](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clean_URL#Slug)

zones.description: List of the child zones of this zone

items.description: Stationery items placed in the zone
